histogram.name: AccountManager.AccountAdditionResultStatus
histogram.summary: Records the result of in-session account addition (or re-authentication) triggers on Chrome OS. This is recorded whenever an in-session account addition (or re-authentication) is triggered and user finishes or cancels the flow.

histogram.name: AccountManager.AccountAdditionSource
histogram.summary: Records the source of in-session account addition (or re-authentication) triggers on Chrome OS. This is recorded whenever an in-session account addition (or re-authentication) is triggered - either explicitely by the user, or automatically by Gaia (for accounts requiring immediate re-authentication).

histogram.name: AccountManager.EduCoexistence.FetchAccessTokenResult
histogram.summary: The result of fetching an access token for the child with `accounts.reauth` scope in secondary EDU account addition flow. Recorded after parent enters their password. This metric covers both v1 and v2 of EduCoexistence.

histogram.name: AccountManager.EduCoexistenceV2.InSessionFlowResult
histogram.summary: Records the last completed step in the EDU account addition flow. Allows to track the drop rate by important states during the in session flow.

histogram.name: AccountManager.EduCoexistenceV2.OnboardingFlowResult
histogram.summary: Records the last completed step in the EDU account addition flow. Allows to track the drop rate by important states during onboarding.

histogram.name: AccountManager.FacadeGetAccountsMojoStatus
histogram.summary: Records the status of the mojo connection between the Ash account manager and the Lacros account manager facade, when `AccountManagerFacade::GetAccounts()` is called. See https://crbug.com/1287297

histogram.name: AccountManager.InitializationTime
histogram.summary: Measures the time taken to fully initialize Chrome OS Account Manager. This is recorded once per user session, at login time. This metric only reports from Chrome OS, which has a high resolution clock.

histogram.name: AccountManager.ManageAccountsServiceType
histogram.summary: Tracks the service type received with the mirror response header.

histogram.name: AccountManager.MojoDisconnections.AccessTokenFetcherRemote
histogram.summary: Tracks the number of Mojo pipe disconnections observed by the access token fetcher Mojo remote in `AccountManagerFacadeImpl`. This is logged at the end of the destruction of `AccountManagerFacadeImpl::AccessTokenFetcher`. This will correspond to the end of an access token fetch request. This is logged for Ash - ChromeOS and Lacros - ChromeOS.

histogram.name: AccountManager.MojoDisconnections.AccountManagerObserverReceiver
histogram.summary: Tracks the number of Mojo pipe disconnections observed by the `AccountManagerObserver` Mojo receiver in `AccountManagerFacadeImpl`. This is logged at the end of the destruction of `AccountManagerFacadeImpl`. Since `AccountManagerFacadeImpl` is a singleton, this is logged once per session (Per browser session for Lacros and per user session for Ash). This is logged for Ash - ChromeOS and Lacros - ChromeOS.

histogram.name: AccountManager.MojoDisconnections.AccountManagerRemote
histogram.summary: Tracks the number of Mojo pipe disconnections observed by the Account Manager Mojo remote in `AccountManagerFacadeImpl`. This is logged at the end of the destruction of `AccountManagerFacadeImpl`. Since `AccountManagerFacadeImpl` is a singleton, this is logged once per session (Per browser session for Lacros and per user session for Ash). This is logged for Ash - ChromeOS and Lacros - ChromeOS.

histogram.name: AccountManager.NumAccounts
histogram.summary: Tracks the number of accounts stored in Chrome OS Account Manager by a given user. This is recorded only once per session, at login time.

histogram.name: AccountManager.TokenLoadStatus
histogram.summary: Tracks the status of token loads from disk by Chrome OS Account Manager, for a given user. This is recorded only once per session, at login time.
